fields.headline: Big Apple MacExpo
fields.bodyText: We're expecting a few interesting announcements tomorrow at MacWorld in New York, but Steve Jobs' keynote will be too late for Online's print deadlines. Have no fear: we'll still be doing full coverage on the web. I'll be filing to Guardian Unlimited's Netnews section tomorrow afternoon, after Apple CEO Steve Jobs has done his sales pitch. Self-linking to the story will doubtless appear here, too.
